## Question 2: Correlation Between Experience and Programming Languages Used

```{r, echo = FALSE}
columns_to_check <- c("col1", "col2", "col3")
data <- data[rowSums(is.na(data[columns_to_check])) < length(columns_to_check), ]

# Verify the result
head(data)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
convert_to_midpoint <- function(year_range) {
  if (year_range == "I have never written code") {
    return(0)
  } else if (year_range == "< 1 years") {
    return(0.5)
  } else if (year_range == "1-2 years") {
    return(1.5)
  } else if (year_range == "3-5 years") {
    return(4)
  } else if (year_range == "5-10 years") {
    return(7.5)
  } else if (year_range == "10-20 years") {
    return(15)
  } else if (year_range == "20+ years") {
    return(25)  # Approximation for "20+ years"
  } else {
    return(NA)  # Handle unexpected values
  }
}

# Apply the function to the q6 column
data$years_experience <- sapply(data$Q6, convert_to_midpoint)

language_columns <- grep("^Q7_", names(data), value = TRUE)
data$num_languages <- rowSums(!is.na(data[language_columns]))
```
